name: Five Nights at SDLG Bonnie
description:
Welcome to Mr Grease House, you are him, and you will have to survive to this evil Animatronics = Veno Foxy, Golden Chica and SDLG Bonnie (Bonnie Grasoso)

Hope you enjoy this expierence! Remember to Survive.

CEPTIX TEAM :

Terpha.22 - 3D Artist - Drawing Maker - Concept Artist

Haxxer - Programmer - Composer - Gameplay Idea Maker

this is a Five Nights at Freddy's Fan-Game, we were based on it to create the Game.
